title: Sex on the Beach Cocktail Recipe
announce: So I have to say one of the best drink's I've drunk so far has become my favorite drink as well

ingredients.title: cranberry juice or Cranberry Rectal
ingredients.description: 8 cl cranberry juice or Cranberry Rectal

title: Eight Cocktail
announce: Shake the ingredients vigorously with a few ice cubes for about 10 seconds and then strain into a martini glass or a shooter glass. Put an After Eight in the glass.

ingredients.title: Creme de Menthe
ingredients.description: 2 cl of Creme de Menthe green
